page.title: 06Employment
page.content: The major employer of labour in Holyhead is SEALINK and the ship repair yard.Many are employed as seamen and crew on the car ferries and container vessels.However the ship repair industry has been run down due to the lack of an adequate dry dock to hold the larger vessels of today. The unemployment rate in the area is 21%.This rate could be higher if the proposed layoff of workers at the Anglesey Aluminium becomes fact. School leavers find it very difficult tofind full time employment.A few ,especially girls,find work in the service industry.The boys that do not have examination passes are placed on Government training schemes.
